name: earthcontrol.dk
content:
Earth Control is one of Denmark's largest producer of nuts and dried fruit. They have for many years been called “System Frugt”. After running without marketing for many years, they had decided to market themselves with a rebranding.

The website is now version 2.0. The first version was coded in 2013 also be me. The second version was coded in 2015.

The website was built in WordPress with our own home-built theme. There are registered 5 different CPT's which represent their own product groups. The administration area has been made ​​user-friendly with ACF. Besides the normal ACF fields, there is also used ACF’s flexible content editor to build new pages and normal pages with blocks.

There is used Facebook API to retrieve predefined Facebook posts based on their Post ID. The response JSON has then been styled to match the visual identity.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, JSON, ANGULAR, PHP

name: thecolorrun.dk
content:
The Color Run is Denmark's most colorful 5 km run. Their previous website was a bought pre-made theme in WordPress. With the new website they wanted the website to resemble the main page thecolorrun.com. Therefore we were asked to clone the main page design to the new Danish website.

The new website has currently 4 languages ​​and more can be added. All pages are built with ACF's flexible content editor. It has also extra ACF options fields to control various settings such as: “night mode” where the entire page will be inverted with an black background and night mode stylesheet.

There was also added a modal, which pops up when the user is leaving the homepage.

And finally there were used Instagram API to retrieve the last 9 images from a particular hashtag per language.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, JSON, ANGULAR, PHP

name: rby.dk
content:
Ruby Cocktail bar is a very prestigious cocktail and drinks bar in Copenhagen. They were in need of a new website, since their previous website was a pure Flash page, which was not mobile friendly at all.

One of the requirements was to be able to reserve a table. That was resolved with a modified plugin named: Restaurant Reservations. Extra fields was added and extra styling of the date and time popup. In the administration area you can approve or reject reservations.

The design is somewhat atypical, so position: fixed; was used at lot.

name: filmakademiet.dk
content:
The Danish Film Academy is an organization that runs and controls the Robert award and aims to promote film as an independent art form.

They needed a new website with a new visual identity. One of the main functionalities was that members should have access to a private area of the site, where they could update their membership information. In addition people could also sign up their own films to be considered for a Robert award.

In the administration area you can see a list of members. Here you can approve and edit members who have applied for a membership. All members are synchronized with Mailchimp, so they can all receive newsletters.

There are used ACF option fields to control the slider and various settings.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, JSON, PHP

name: hansons.dk
content:
Hansons.dk is a company who specialize in several areas of property services, among other is cleaning graffiti. They had a previous site which was made ​​with a template machine from another company. They had therefore not very much control over texts areas or images. Many of the texts areas were also images, so that search engines could not index the text areas.

We therefore advised them to implement their current design to a WordPress installation. So this task was a simple HTML-to-WordPress task.

There has been added extra functionality like: before/after photos with drag slider, improved contact form with file upload and slider with text areas.

name: handing.dk
content:
Handing.dk is a company which specialize in selling new / used equipment for dairies or other companies who process fluids. They had an old WordPress installation, which had not been updated in many years. They were very keen to retain the old design, so they got to keep that.

The big assignment was, however, to make a plugin that could import 1500 products from a CSV file generated from the C5 accounting program and distribute it in 5 different languages ​​via WPML.

The plugin has its own interface, where you can upload a CSV file and begin the import process. You can also monitor the import progress via a progress bar, which is updated with an AJAX call that calls every 1 minute. You can also choose to delete the products and clean out the catalog.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, JSON, CSV, PHP

name: motorhistorisk.dk
content:
Motorhistorisk Samråd is an organization that handles all veteran clubs and veteran license plates throughout Denmark. Their previous website was an old Joomla page. They needed a site that was more user-friendly and where they had a better opportunity to create and add new content.

There was created several CPT'er, all of which are controlled by the ACF fields. In addition there was also coded an advanced booking form, which created a CPT every time a member orders a licenses plate. The CPT can then be added additional information. You can also generate a PDF based on the total content, which can be downloaded and sent to Skat.

Finally I also used Instagram and Facebook APIs to retrieve posts and images.

name: jagtnettet.dk
content:
Jagtnettet is a small business that advertise courses in hunting and wildlife. The website will serve as a catalog where the user can navigate and directly contact the provider of the courses through a contact form.

One of the main functionalities was a filter where you can filter the search for a course. It applies to everything from date, weekend, place and price.

name: mermaidprojektet.dk
content:
The Mermaid Project is an independent institution that identifies and finances groundbreaking international projects in the field of gynecologic cancer research.

Their previous website was a Joomla page where the client had difficulties when updating and generating new content. Therefore, they chose to convert it into a WordPress website. The website was also not mobile friendly.

We cleaned up the design and added a footer with a Mailchimp subscription form.

On the page with their history we also made ​​a visual timeline that tells the development of the institution.

name: innologic.dk
content:
Innologic is the largest Danish-based consultancy with 100% focus on SAP Business Intelligence (BI).

The website is a standard profile site which has subpages with their area of industry and work. It also has a list of customers, a blog and a news summary.

There is a contact form under each page.

name: rosendahls-begravelse.dk
content:
Rosendahls begravelse is a funeral company that has offices throughout Nordsjælland.

They had an old Joomla website, but needed a more user-friendly website, so the choice fell on a WordPress website. The website is a standard profile site with subpages on their products.

There is also a list of locale offices with contact info.

name: beruf.dk
content:
My current workplace needed a new website, so we brainstormed on what we should do. We ended up making a full page slider on our two focus areas: Websites and AdWords. The rest of the websites had normal subpages.

The website has a blog, which uses jQuery plugin MixItUp to sort the posts into categories.

name: cheche.dk
content:
Cheche is a small consulting firm that specializes in conference and meeting management. The website is a simple profile website with specialmade ​​jQuery animation.

The site has two languages.

name: mimer.io
content:
Mimer.io is a SaaS product that customers can use in conjunction with their Google Analytics data. With Mimer.io you can create dashboards with widgets to visualize your data in a grid. You can drag around and resize these widgets. Theses dashboards can also be converted into reports that can be sent to email recipients that are defined on a list. There are also premade dashboards and widgets for easier creation.

The whole backend system is built with ExpressJS. On the frontend, AngularJS is used to built a fully functional one page web application. AngularJS uses API endpoints defined by ExpressJS. Theses endpoints delivers a JSON response with data belonging to the current logged in user.

The authentication are handled by ExpressJS. An administration area has been built to manage and create new users or accounts. Here you can also create new premade dashboards and widgets.
tags:
HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, ANGULAR,
JSON, NODEJS, EXPRESSJS, GULP, HEROKU

name: djaevlen.github.io
content:
My portfolio is made with Jekyll. Is was a learning experience for me and i learned a lot from it. It's all custom made HTML and CSS3, with no use of a CSS framework.

The source code can be viewed here: Github
